description: Get line-oriented records from new S3 objects based on notifications
name: Fetch new logs on S3

queue_name.description: The name of the SQS queue that received the notifications of the creation of S3 objects

chunk_size.description: The size of chunks for the batch processing

separator.description: The separator used between each records (default: the linefeed character '\n')

skip_first.description: The number of records to skip at the begining of each S3 object (default: 0)

ignore_comments.description: Flag to ignore commented lines (starting with the character `#`; default: false)

delete_consumed_messages.description: Flag to delete consuming messages (default: false)

intake_key.description: Intake key to use when sending events
